dhp44:1: imaṁ → komaṁ (mr) | vicessati → vijessati (sya-all, pts1ed, pts2ed)
dhp49:2: vaṇṇagandhamaheṭhayaṁ → vaṇṇagandhaṁ aheṭhayaṁ (bj, pts1ed, pts2ed); vaṇṇavantaṁ agandhakaṁ (cck); vaṇṇavantaṁ aheṭhayaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); vaṇṇagandhamapoṭhayaṁ (mr)
dhp52:4: hoti kubbato → pakubbato (bj); sukubbato (sya-all, km); sakubbato (pts1ed, pts2ed)
dhp56:2: yāyaṁ tagaracandanī → yvāyaṁ tagaracandanī (sya-all); yvāyaṁ tagaracandanaṁ (csp1ed)
